scrapeMeta.notes: Deep scrape of 4 ISG brand websites. Pricing universally requires direct contact. Georgia Western has ~1,090 electric valve actuator SKUs (46 pages); representative sample extracted. IAC blocks direct page fetches (403); data sourced from search index. Dynamic-MS and RSI are catalog/quote-request sites with no public SKU-level e-commerce.

brands.description: Largest stocking distributor of electric valve actuators in the Southeastern US. 20-year history with Emerson Actuation Technologies. Largest stocking distributor of M2CP Series valve actuators in North America.
